faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating her perfect virtual date.
faq.contact_text: Have a question? We'd love to hear from you.

questions.question: Does she need a VR headset?
questions.answer: No! It works perfectly on any smartphone, tablet, or laptop. She can look around by dragging or moving her phone.

questions.question: How long does it take to make?
questions.answer: It takes about 5 minutes for you to upload the photo and song and write the note. We generate the link instantly after payment.

questions.question: Can I change the song later?
questions.answer: No, you cannot edit your date space details after creation.

questions.question: Is it private?
questions.answer: Yes, the link is private and only accessible to people you share it with.

questions.question: What if I don't have a Spotify or Apple Music account?
questions.answer: You can still use any public song link from these platforms. If you can't find the song there, please contact us and we'll help you out.

questions.question: How do I receive my date space link?
questions.answer: You will receive it 24 hours after purchase, or instantly in 5 minutes if you choose the instant shipping option at checkout.
